summary: Assassins
title: Assassins
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2JQHmKu

by PossessedJoker

When the world is threatened by an alien army, Nick Fury ask John Wick, the boogeyman, to join the Avengers Initiative.

John Wick and Natasha Romanoff have more in common than they think.

A Natasha Romanoff love story.

 

A Marvel/John Wick crossover story.

You don’t need to have seen John Wick, however there are references. I suggest you watch John Wick if you haven’t seen it as it is amazing.

Words: 4624, Chapters: 6/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), John Wick (Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Avengers Team (MCU), Natasha Romanov (Marvel), John Wick, Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Hulk (Marvel), Thor (Marvel), Hawkeye
  • Relationships: Natasha Romanov & John Wick, Natasha Romanov (Marvel) & John Wick, John Wick/Original Female Character(s)
  • Additional Tags: Assassins, Romance, Swearing, dont really know what to tag haha


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2JQHmKu

summary: It's really weird how so many Steve fans hate Tony so much--like violently, when I've not seen nearly as much Steve hate from...
body: It’s really weird how so many Steve fans hate Tony so much–like violently, when I’ve not seen nearly as much Steve hate from Tony fans. Like sure,Tony is my favorite, but I still love Cap! We can all love and appreciate both of them!!

reblog.comment: It’s really weird how so many Steve fans hate Tony so much–like violently, when I’ve not seen nearly as much Steve hate from Tony fans. Like sure,Tony is my favorite, but I still love Cap! We can all love and appreciate both of them!!

trail.content_raw: It’s really weird how so many Steve fans hate Tony so much–like violently, when I’ve not seen nearly as much Steve hate from Tony fans. Like sure,Tony is my favorite, but I still love Cap! We can all love and appreciate both of them!!
trail.content: It’s really weird how so many Steve fans hate Tony so much–like violently, when I’ve not seen nearly as much Steve hate from Tony fans. Like sure,Tony is my favorite, but I still love Cap! We can all love and appreciate both of them!!

blog.name: idyllicstarker
blog.title: ~ Starker ~
blog.description: Skylar | She/her | Starker writes | Or just Marvel writes | Requests and prompts always open so please send some in | All characters are above the age of consent unless stated otherwise

tags: this is my first time writing
summary:
🌻🌻🌻
Peter’s favourite flowers are sunflowers
Tony never understood it because he saw them as the most boring of flowers 
They...
body:
🌻🌻🌻

  • Peter’s favourite flowers are sunflowers
  • Tony never understood it because he saw them as the most boring of flowers
  • They were just yellow
  • They grew big
  • And they were bright
  • He didn’t see the appeal, or why Peter seemed to love them so much more then any other
  • There was plenty of others to choose from
  • Lotus, roses, even tulips were much more beautiful than sunflowers
  • But Peter didn’t care for them
  • And as time progressed, Tony would always buy the young spider flowers as little gifts
  • Big, beautiful bouquets that made Peter flush and grow all shy because “oh mr stark I don’t deserve it”
  • And yet Tony always refused his offers to give them to Pepper instead
  • And yet he always made sure, that the gifts that came from the heart, when he wanted to reassure Peter that he was proud of him, were sunflowers
  • And Peter appreacited that more than anything, because it showed he listened and it showed he cared
  • Slowly Tony began to see the full flowers in a different light
  • Every time he passed by one, he’d smile, remembering his little Peter
  • In fact he began to see the beauty in the colour yellow itself
  • And as colour associated with happiness, it sure was doing its job for Tony
  • But he didn’t fully appreciate sunflowers, until he had Peter bent over his desk
  • His perfect round ass up in the air
  • As Tony’s long wandering tongue pushed against the bundle of nerves at his opening
  • They hadn’t even took their clothes off yet, eager bunnies desperate for each other
  • That much was clear by the whines and mewles escaping his baby “Oh mr stark please.. please I need you”
  • And as Tony gripped at his ass, ignoring his pleas and continuing to mouth at his perfectly puckered, and pink hole, his thumbs ran over the denim of Peter’s jeans
  • With the sound of Pete’s moans in his ears, he gripped onto the pale flesh tighter, his gaze stuck on the bunch of sunflowers that were poking out the back of Peter’s pocket

🌻🌻🌻

blog.description: ATL | 20 | bi man | - Hi there! I'm Chase and this is my art blog. Don't interact with my content if you ship St@rker. Don't repost my art. DM for commission info. ☆ patreon ☆ ko-fi ☆ personal blog ☆

tags: the mcu said 'our universe is earth 616' and i said............. anyways.....
initially i was just gonna draw 616 tony but then i got the bright idea to make a sketch dump
i wasn't gonna include natasha stark at first but then
i was going through tags and a lot of people include her in their multiverse tony art
and it's upsetting cause like..... most fans draw her like she's 25 or younger
i know natasha stark has like. no dialogue bc she's an insignificant minor character but like!!!
let her be old you cowards !!!!!!!!
like if you're drawing tony as a man in his forties then you should give natasha the same age... cowards

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Someday
title: Someday
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2EIxpKM

by S_Horne

Steve didn’t need to get married. He didn’t need a piece of paper and a fancy ring as long as he had Tony by his side and in his heart. A wedding was just commercial compared to the love that he shared with his partner. That was enough for him to be satisfied; just the fact that he could call Tony his was sufficient.

Maybe if he told himself that enough times, he might start to believe it.

OR

National Smile Day

Series: Part 31 of A May Medley

  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark

Dr. Strange: No, that’s Stark.

Tony: Yeah, get it right.
trail.content:
Y/N: You’re strange.

Dr. Strange: No, that’s Stark.

Tony: Yeah, get it right.

summary:
Scott: Have you seen the Quantum Realm numbers?
Tony: NOMFuP.
Scott: What?
Tony: NOMFuP. N-O-M-F-P. Not My Fucking Problem. I...
body:
Scott: Have you seen the Quantum Realm numbers?
Tony: NOMFuP.
Scott: What?
Tony: NOMFuP. N-O-M-F-P. Not My Fucking Problem. I quite like that. Did you like that? I'll use that quite a lot today.

summary: We're A Mess Now, Huh?
title: We're A Mess Now, Huh?
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2W8e1fX

by GalaxyThreads

Thor falls off the Bifrost instead of Loki. It changes nothing. (It changes everything)

Or: After years spent with Thanos, Thor’s mission gather the Infinity Stones is halted when a young man arrives claiming to be his brother. Thor knows better, though, he is a son of Thanos; and he’s never heard of Asgard before.

Words: 9910, Chapters: 1/3, Language: English

  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, No Archive Warnings Apply

  • Relationships: Loki & Thor, Odin & Thor (Marvel), Frigga | Freyja & Thor (Marvel), Clint Barton & Loki
